solution_line_template: There are {num_boxes} boxes x {erasers_per_box} erasers = <<{num_boxes}*{erasers_per_box}={total_erasers}>>{total_erasers} erasers.
The student council will make {total_erasers} erasers x ${price_per_eraser} = $<<{total_erasers}*{price_per_eraser}={total_money}>>{total_money}.
